title: “Car and driver” body text serif
author: Vykintas

comments.content:
I’d need a larger sample to be absolutely sure, but Freight Text seems a decent match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-text/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317165549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-text/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-text/")
